type.name: UI Context
type.description: Used to describe the contexts which a form or UI control can operate in.

type.name: Rendering Control Type
type.description: An abstract representation of a control that can be rendered.

boolField.name: Requires context
boolField.description: Does this control require a resource context in which to run?

boolField.name: Hidden from form designer
boolField.description: Is the render control hidden from the form designer?

stringField.name: Design time render control
stringField.description: The control used by the Html designer to render the control.

stringField.name: Render control name
stringField.description: The control used during runtime to render the control.

stringField.name: View render control
stringField.description: The control used by the view mode of the control.

intField.name: Minimum width
intField.description: The minimum width in pixels that this control requires to render correctly.

intField.name: Minimum height
intField.description: The minimum height in pixels that this control requires to render correctly.

intField.name: Minimum width (tablet)
intField.description: The minimum width in pixels that this control requires to render correctly on a tablet device.

intField.name: Minimum height (tablet)
intField.description: The minimum height in pixels that this control requires to render correctly on a tablet device.

intField.name: Minimum width (mobile)
intField.description: The minimum width in pixels that this control requires to render correctly on a mobile device.

intField.name: Minimum height (mobile)
intField.description: The minimum height in pixels that this control requires to render correctly on a mobile device.

boolField.name: Pager support (mobile)
boolField.description: Indicates if this control has support for the paged rendering model for forms on mobile devices.

relationship.name: Applicable context
relationship.description: The context a rendering control is applicable for.

type.name: Custom Rendering Control Type
type.description: A purpose built control for exclusive use on select forms.

stringField.name: Icon
stringField.description: The icon displayed with the control in the toolbox.

relationship.name: For type
relationship.description: The type that this control will present on forms for.

relationship.name: For relationship
relationship.description: The relationship that instances of this control are to render.

relationship.name: Default vertical resize mode
relationship.description: How instances of this control should initially size themselves vertically.

relationship.name: Default horizontal resize mode
relationship.description: How instances of this control should initially size themselves horizontally.

relationship.name: Required forms
relationship.description: Form instances that this control implementation relies upon.

relationship.name: Required reports
relationship.description: Report instances that this control implementation relies upon.

type.name: Context Provider
type.description: A rendering control that is able to provide contexts that Context receivers can use.

type.name: Context Receiver
type.description: A rendering control that is able to be bound to the context produced by another control.

type.name: Field Rendering Control Type
type.description: The rendering controls allowing the relationships between the applicable contexts and fields to be specified

relationship.name: Field type to render
relationship.description: This control is able to render the contents of the the related type of field.

relationship.name: Default control for field
relationship.description: This control is the default control to use for a given ui context.

relationship.name: Field instance to render
relationship.description: This control is able to render the contents of the related field.

type.name: Relationship Rendering Control Type
type.description: The rendering controls allowing the relationships between the applicable contexts and relationships to be specified

type.name: Structure Rendering Control Type
type.description: The rendering controls used to structure the page for display

type.name: Control on Form
type.description: A class representing any control instance on a form providing the order of controls

intField.name: Ordinal
intField.description: The order a control appears on a form

intField.name: Width
intField.description: The width of the control on a form

intField.name: Height
intField.description: The height of the control on a form

stringField.name: Background colour
stringField.description: The background colour of the control.

boolField.name: Read only
boolField.description: Specifies whether the field or relationship should appear as read-only when in edit mode.

boolField.name: Mandatory control
boolField.description: Is the control mandatory to complete for this form.

boolField.name: Hide label
boolField.description: Specify whether the control label is visible.

boolField.name: Show help text
boolField.description: Specify show the help text for control.

stringField.name: Visibility calculation
stringField.description: The visibility calculation.

relationship.name: Related entity data path nodes
relationship.description: The data path nodes of the relationship to render.

relationship.name: Horizontal resize mode
relationship.description: Controls resizing along horizonatal direction.

relationship.name: Vertical resize mode
relationship.description: Controls resizing along vertical direction.

type.name: Related Entity Data Path Node
type.description: A class describing a node in a path of relationships.

fieldGroup.name: Related Entity Data Path Node Details

intField.name: Ordinal
intField.description: The order of the data path node.

relationship.name: Data path node relationship
relationship.description: The data path node relationship.

relationship.name: Data path node relationship direction
relationship.description: The data path node relationship direction.

k:renderControlType.name: Structure Control On Form
k:renderControlType.description: Represents a structure control instance on a form and its contained subcontrols

type.name: Custom Edit Form
type.description: A edit for with customized layout and fields

boolField.name: Allow select multiple types
boolField.description: If the field is set to true, then the form will have option to convert types.

boolField.name: Show help text
boolField.description: Specify show the help text for form.

resourceKey.name: Unique name per edit form
resourceKey.resourceKeyMessage: There is another form with the same name.

relationship.name: Edits type
relationship.description: The UI context a form is valid for

relationship.name: UI context
relationship.description: The UI context a form is valid for

relationship.name: Form
relationship.description: The form used to display the record.

type.name: Screen
type.description: A screen with customised layout with reports and forms.

k:renderControlType.name: fieldControlOnForm
k:renderControlType.description: Represents a field control instance on a form and the field it relates to

stringField.name: Group name
stringField.description: Specify the group name of the control belongs to.

relationship.name: Field
relationship.description: The field that this control is rendering.

k:renderControlType.name: RelationshipControlOnForm
k:renderControlType.description: Represents a relationship control instance on a form and the relationship it represents

relationship.name: Relationship
relationship.description: The relationship that this control is rendering.

relationship.name: Picker report
relationship.description: The picker report to use

relationship.name: Display report
relationship.description: The report to use when displaying related entities.

relationship.name: Display form
relationship.description: The form to use when displaying related entities.

relationship.name: Edit form relationship behavior
relationship.description: The behavior object to use when displaying a relationship report. In particular, controls which buttons get shown.

relationship.name: Picker structure view
relationship.description: The picker structure to use

relationship.name: Default value
relationship.description: The default value of relationship field control

relationship.name: Relationship control filters
relationship.description: Relationship filters.

type.name: Relationship Control Filter Details
type.description: A class describing a relationship control filter.

relationship.name: Relationship control filter
relationship.description: The control which has the value of the related entity to filter by.

relationship.name: Relationship filter
relationship.description: The relationship to filter by.

relationship.name: Relationship direction filter
relationship.description: The relationship direction to filter by.

type.name: FieldTypeDisplayName
type.description: Display name used by a field type.

relationship.name: FieldTypeDisplayName
relationship.description: Relates a field type to display name that is used on the UI.

relationship.name: Default edit form
relationship.description: The default edit form for a Entity Type

relationship.name: Default tablet form
relationship.description: The default edit form for a Entity Type

relationship.name: Resource viewer console custom form
relationship.description: Describes the 'resourceViewerConsoleForm' relationship definition.

relationship.name: Resource viewer tablet custom form
relationship.description: Describes the 'resourceViewerTabletForm' relationship definition.

type.name: Console Theme
type.description: Used to control the look and feel of the console.

relationship.name: Logo image
relationship.description: The image that should be used for the logo at the top left of the console.

relationship.name: Header background image
relationship.description: The image that should be used for the console header area background.

relationship.name: Top navigation area background image
relationship.description: The image that should be used for the console top navigation area background.

relationship.name: Left navigation area background image
relationship.description: The image that should be used for the console left navigation area background.

relationship.name: Top navigation style
relationship.description: The top navigation style options

stringField.name: Header background colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the header background colour.

stringField.name: Header menu text colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the header menu text.

stringField.name: Top navigation area background colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the top navigation area background.

stringField.name: Selected tab colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the top navigation area Selected Tab.

stringField.name: Selected tab border colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the top navigation area Selected Tab border.

stringField.name: Selected tab font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the top navigation area Selected Tab.

stringField.name: Unselected tab colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the top navigation area Unselected Tab.

stringField.name: Unselected tab font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the top navigation area Unselected Tab.

boolField.name: Top navigation area background image repeat
boolField.description: Horizontal repeat top navigation background image?

stringField.name: Left navigation area background colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the left navigation area background.

stringField.name: Mobile left navigation area background colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the mobile left navigation area background.

stringField.name: Left navigation area font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the left navigation area.

stringField.name: Selected navigation element colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the left navigation selected navigation element.

stringField.name: Selected navigation font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the left navigation selected navigation font.

boolField.name: Left navigation area background image repeat
boolField.description: Veritical repeat left navigation background image?

stringField.name: Title font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the general content area title.

stringField.name: Container heading font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the general content area Heading.

stringField.name: Container heading line colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The line colour of the general content area Heading.

stringField.name: Form tab control selected tab colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The selected tab colour of the general content area form tab.

stringField.name: Form tab control selected tab font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The selected tab font colour of the general content area form tab.

stringField.name: Form tab control unselected tab colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The unselected tab colour of the general content area form tab.

stringField.name: Form tab control unselected tab font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The unselected tab font colour of the general content area form tab.

stringField.name: Tab control line colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the general content area tab control line.

stringField.name: Report header colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The colour of the general content area report header.

stringField.name: Report header font colour (ARGB)
stringField.description: The font colour of the general content area report header.

relationship.name: Tenant theme
relationship.description: The tenant specific theme.

relationship.name: Console theme settings
relationship.description: The application specific console theme settings.

intField.name: Maximum event log entries
intField.description: Maximum number of log entries to store.
